channel.title: Looking for a demonoid Invitation code
channel.description: Yes I know Ron made a thread on this, but its [b]dead[/b]. Anyways can anyone please get me an invit code? I just recently got banned from the site. (Not my IP, my account lol I know the difference). First one to get me a code via PM will get a gift from me =)

item.title: Looking for a demonoid Invitation code
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

irfan786:

Yes I know Ron made a thread on this, but its dead. Anyways can anyone please get me an invit code? I just recently got banned from the site. (Not my IP, my account lol I know the difference). First one to get me a code via PM will get a gift from me =)

It’s not dead. I still got an invitation in my control panel no one has used. Your just lazy.

Read full topic

item.title: Looking for a demonoid Invitation code
item.dc:creator: @davidude36 Brolapse
item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

hey i can probably get you one, hang on a second, i know ure not online now but ill pm it to you if i can get you one.
damn sorry man:-
You can not create more invitations at the moment
Invitation codes are limited based on time since last creation and other factors.
Please check back this space, you’ll be notified here when you are able to create an invitation again.

Read full topic
